name: Missing Return Statement
description: A function does not have a return statement.

name: Integer Overflow/Underflow
description: An arithmetic operation results in an integer value that exceeds the allowable range.
pattern: Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication with large values

name: Private Key Exposure
description: A variable name suggests that it contains a private key.
pattern: privatekey, private_key, secretkey, secret_key, keypair, key_pair, api_key

name: Reentrancy
description: A function calls an external contract before updating its state.

name: Floating Pragma
description: Deprecated functions that can lead to security vulnerabilities are used.

name: Denial of Service
description: Functions that can cause a denial of service.

name: Unchecked External Call
description: An external call is made without checking its result.

name: Greedy/Suicidal Contract
description: A contract makes fund transfers without proper condition checks.
